shortDescription: An OS command injection vulnerability was found in the Avaya Aura Device Services Web application which could allow remote code execution as the Web server user via a malicious uploaded file. This issue affects Avaya Aura Device Services version 8.1.4.0 and earlier.
vulnerabilityName: avaya aura_device_services Unrestricted Upload of File with Dangerous Type
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
